setting.name: participant-code
setting.label: Participant code
setting.description: DTMF digits for participant login. Can be empty.

setting.name: organizer_admit
setting.label: Require organizer
setting.description: If set the conference will admit participants only if there is an organizer in the conference

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE_STATUS
setting.description: Controls the status of a conference; this may have the following values: CONFIGURE - Instantiates the name of the conference, but does start it - only configuration operations are allowed. In this state, the conference does not originate or accept any SIP signaling or RTP. AVAILABLE - Set when the conference has been configured and may accept calls (subject to the access controls configured for the conference).

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.AOR
setting.description: The SIP URI (may include the full name-addr value) this conference should register and use as its AOR. The default is the conference 'name' token as the user part with the BOSTON_BRIDGE_SIP_DOMAIN host part.

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.REGISTER
setting.label: Register
setting.description: If set conference will attempt to register its AOR

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.REGISTER_USERNAME
setting.label: Registration name
setting.description: Registration name used when registration is enabled. If empty conference name will be used.

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.REGISTER_PASSWORD
setting.label: Registration password
setting.description: Registration password used when registration is enabled. If empty empty password will be used.

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.REGISTER_REALM
setting.label: Registration realm
setting.description: Security realm to be used when conference is trying to register. Defaults to whatever realm is sent in the challenge.

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.ACCESS
setting.label: Access control
setting.description: Selects the access control mechanism for this conference. If set to "Open" any call to the AOR or contact address for the conference is accepted and immediatly joins the conference. Otherwise participants are required to enter access code, and optionally wait for organizer to start a conference.

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.MAX_LEGS
setting.label: Maximum legs
setting.description: The maximum number of call legs to be allowed by this bridge. 0 means unlimited.

setting.name: BOSTON_BRIDGE_CONFERENCE.REMOTE_ADMIT.SECRET
setting.description: Automatically generated value that is used by remote admittance control.
